name: n8n-nodes-base.formstackTrigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow on a Formstack form submission.

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

formId.name: formId
formId.description: The Formstack form to monitor for new submissions. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
formId.ai_hint: The Formstack form to monitor for new submissions. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
